mapper.select: select date_format((b.publish_date), '%Y') as year, sum(pl.amount * p.product_price) as totalPrice from product p, bill b, purchaseList pl where p.product_id = pl.product_id AND b.b_id = pl.b_id and (b.publish_date like concat(#{year}, '%') or b.publish_date like concat(#{year}-1, '%') or b.publish_date like concat(#{year}-2, '%')) group by date_format((b.publish_date), '%Y')

select b.publish_date as publish_date, sum(pl.amount * p.product_price) as totalPrice from product p, bill b, purchaseList pl where p.product_id = pl.product_id AND b.b_id = pl.b_id and (b.publish_date <= curDate() and b.publish_date >= subDate(curDate(), Interval 7 DAY)) group by b.publish_date;
